body_html: Right now our GPU libs are very optimized, but we can't say the same about the CPU backend. It's getting better, but we still aren't there where numpy is, and this is probably why are you seeing this difference. Can you try running your script with OMP_NUM_THREADS=X where X is 8 (or less if you have fewer cores)?

body: Right now our GPU libs are very optimized, but we can't say the same about the CPU backend. It's getting better, but we still aren't there where numpy is, and this is probably why are you seeing this difference. Can you try running your script with `OMP_NUM_THREADS=X` where X is 8 (or less if you have fewer cores)?
